Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 9th overall pick, by Detroit in 1982...
Injured on 5/2/1983 with a Stiff Neck, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit on 5/12/1985, off Bryn Smith (NYY)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/26/1985, off Bret Saberhagen (CHW)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1985, hitting .467 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 22-game hitting streak snapped on 8/24/1985...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1985, hitting .656 with 0 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1985, hitting .427 with 2 HR, 20 RBI...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1985, hitting .360 with 11 HR, 75 RBI...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1987, hitting .413 with 2 HR, 19 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1987, hitting .591 with 0 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 7/16/1987...
Won MVP Award in 1987, hitting .380 with 14 HR, 91 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1988, hitting .419 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1989, hitting .410 with 4 HR, 13 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1990, hitting .520 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1990, hitting .434 with 6 HR, 20 RBI...
Injured on 5/8/1990 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against California on 5/30/1990...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Won MVP Award in 1990, hitting .364 with 23 HR, 110 RBI...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 7/13/1991...
Hit for the cycle against Cleveland on 9/24/1991...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Minnesota on 4/13/1992...
Won World Series with Detroit in 1992...
Was selected to the 1993 Allstar game...
Had 2000th career hit on 6/15/1994, off Kevin Rogers (MIN)...
